Title: Enumeration
References: ŠTULAJTEROVÁ, A., JESENSKÁ, P.: English Stylistics. 1. vyd. Banská Bystrica : Univerzita Mateja Bela, 2013. 114 s.
Content:
Enumeration can be a stylistic device when objects, phenomena, properties or actions are named one by one.

Enumeration of this kind assumes a stylistic function as the object in the enumeration are not distributed in a logical order and therefore become stylistically significant.

example:

  • Free to feel whatever he felt - fear, guilt, shame, love, grief, pity.
